description: Details about the admission to a healthcare service

fields.description: The location/organization from which the patient came before admission
fields.label: Origin

fields.description: From where patient was admitted (physician referral, transfer)
fields.label: Admit Source

fields.description: The type of hospital re-admission that has occurred (if any). If the value is absent, then this is not identified as a readmission
fields.label: ReAdmission

fields.description: Diet preferences reported by the patient
fields.label: Diet Preference

fields.description: Location/organization to which the patient is discharged
fields.label: Destination

fields.description: Category or kind of location after discharge
fields.label: Discharge Disposition

name: Hospitalization
